law.catch_line: Misrepresentation of having conducted training courses.

text.section: A firearms instructor trainer or certified firearms instructor is guilty of not providing firearms training if he or she represents to the department that he or she has conducted training for a student firearms instructor or for an applicant in an applicant training course and has not, in fact, provided any such training.
Not providing firearms training is a Class D felony.

law.history: Created 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 368, sec. 6, effective July 15, 2002.
